overview: "Merchants of miracles" is a journey to the heart of Kinshasa to discover the « churches of healing’ also called the « churches of awakening » Their promises of healing incurable diseases, of obtaining a visa for the European el dorado or even of immediate prosperity attract the majority of Congolese to these churches. In this unbelievable world, the violence of the worship services reflects that of the misery and the tragic-comical Language of Tel-evangelists, with their cynicism, megalomania and surrealism, responds to the hopeless naivety of the faithful.
title: Marchands de miracles
